subclusters.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Cellular Senescence Theory
Stress-Induced Telomere Shortening and Cellular Aging Theory
Telomere Dysfunction and Genomic Instability Theory

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on telomere shortening leading to cellular senescence and SASP-driven inflammaging, linking telomere attrition directly to senescence and systemic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes telomere length as a biomarker and causal factor of cellular senescence and organismal aging, highlighting telomere attrition as a driver of aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes telomere shortening as a mitotic clock triggering replicative senescence, focusing on cellular aging mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details telomere erosion triggering senescence and the role of telomerase in immortalization, centered on telomere shortening-induced senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights telomere shortening causing cellular senescence and the influence of lifestyle factors on telomerase activity, linking telomere attrition to senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on telomere shortening as a mitotic clock inducing replicative senescence and its conservation across mammals, emphasizing cellular aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes telomere shortening triggering p53-mediated replicative senescence, highlighting molecular pathways linking telomere attrition to senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Covers telomere attrition as a cellular clock causing senescence and genome instability, focusing on telomere shortening-driven aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes telomere shortening as a mitotic clock triggering replicative senescence and links to aging diseases, focusing on cellular senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links telomere attrition to replicative senescence and organismal aging, including genetic and environmental modulation of telomere dynamics.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on telomere erosion limiting immune cell replication, driving immunosenescence and aging, emphasizing telomere shortening-induced senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes progressive telomere shortening influenced by epigenetics and chromosome-specific dynamics, contributing to cellular senescence and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stress-Induced Telomere Shortening and Cellular Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on chronic psychological stress accelerating telomere shortening and cellular aging, highlighting stress as a key modulator of telomere dynamics.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stress-Induced Telomere Shortening and Cellular Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes telomeres as stress sensors accumulating damage from oxidative stress, linking stress-induced damage to replicative senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stress-Induced Telomere Shortening and Cellular Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details psychological stress accelerating telomere shortening and cellular aging, emphasizing cognitive stress and physiological stress arousal.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stress-Induced Telomere Shortening and Cellular Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes a feedback loop where inflammation accelerates telomere shortening and senescence, which further promotes inflammation, linking stress and inflammation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stress-Induced Telomere Shortening and Cellular Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Mathematical modeling shows oxidative stress accelerates telomere shortening beyond replication, linking oxidative damage to cellular aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stress-Induced Telomere Shortening and Cellular Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links oxidative stress and reproductive effort to accelerated telomere shortening and aging, emphasizing stress-related telomere dynamics.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Dysfunction and Genomic Instability Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on telomere dysfunction causing genomic instability, chromosome fusions, and cancer, highlighting telomere capping loss and antagonistic pleiotropy.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Dysfunction and Genomic Instability Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links telomere dysfunction to DNA damage response activation, secretion of aging biomarkers, and innate immunity, emphasizing telomere damage-induced systemic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Dysfunction and Genomic Instability Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes telomere shortening and uncapping by telomere-binding protein loss causing genomic instability and aging phenotypes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Dysfunction and Genomic Instability Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details miR-185 regulation of POT1 leading to telomere deprotection, DNA damage response activation, and cellular senescence, focusing on telomere capping dysfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Dysfunction and Genomic Instability Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes bat longevity linked to enhanced DNA repair and telomere maintenance without shortening, emphasizing genome stability and cancer resistance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Position Effect and Chromatin Architecture Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on telomere shortening altering 3D chromatin loops (TPE-OLD), affecting distal gene expression and nuclear architecture, linking telomere dynamics to epigenetic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Position Effect and Chromatin Architecture Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Mathematical model of telomere shortening dynamics in blood cell subpopulations, linking cell turnover and telomere length heterogeneity to aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Position Effect and Chromatin Architecture Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes genetic regulation of telomere length and structure affecting lifespan via telomere length regulators and chromatin state, emphasizing telomere structure sensing.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Position Effect and Chromatin Architecture Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on telomere and telomerase regulation in stem cell aging, linking telomere dynamics to stem cell function and organismal aging.
